item.description:
As one participant said about last month's meet-up, "It was magical." We felt the same way, so we're going to continue with the same design and intentions.

Let's begin with some time to socialize and get to know one another better and better. Then Ann is planning on guiding you through a meditation to help you connect to your Source Energy/Spirit. Feeling connected to your Source Energy promotes feelings of well-being; and feelings of well-being allow you to attract what you desire and deliberately create!

As a process, we'll talk about and practice "Changing Your Story" - from explanations and stories about what you don't like in your past or present, to what you want.

As always, we'll also spend time on group support and coaching on questions and issues you want to bring to our meeting.

Can't wait to be and create with you all! Please RSVP asap, and also PLEASE invite others to join you! If your plans change after RSVP'ing, please be considerate enough to e-mail us so we won't be unnecessarily be waiting for you to arrive.

With appreciation and joy,

Ann and Mark
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be upstairs. Go to back of front lobby for stairway.

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Metro West Law of Attraction/"Good Vibrations" October Meetup
